description:
Can Data Science & Business Intelligence be Agile? 

Hear what our experts have to say:

Gopal Krishnan, Walmart Labs, 
Raghu Kashyap, Orbitz, 
Joy Montello, Target and 
Sanghamitra Bhattacharjee, HelpChat
title: Can Data Science & Business Intelligence be Agile? Panel led by Naresh Jain
